Research to Production AI

We grow businesses with AI.

Our experienced team advise on strategy, the art of the possible, and use best of breed technologies. We design, build and deploy state-of-the-art intelligent systems for our clients.


Get in touch
Our process

From Concept to Execution

We work with your decision makers to identify high-impact AI opportunities, build strategy and create a company-wide roadmap. 

Research

We leverage the latest research papers to produce state-of-the-art results. We also conduct novel research and create patents to increase your business value and competitive advantage.

More about us
Development

Our team rapidly develop high-throughput, fault-tolerant real-time AI systems using best-of-breed technologies. This includes using agile best practices, setting up data pipelines, ML Ops and CI/CD.

Learn about our process
Production

We set up advanced metrics to ensure reliability and performance of the AI system. Using A/B testing we continually track and optimise to ensure systems learn and realise the full potential of AI.

Realise AI's full potential


Services

From one-off consultations to an end-to-end solution, we have a service that will fit your needs.

  • Complete AI life-cycle solutions
  • Built-in AI governance, fairness and compliance
  • Retain control over your enterprise data
Feasibility Study

Evaluating the latest state-of-the-art from research, we perform experiments to determine the art of the possible.

Proof of Concept

Working with your data, we train models and build a stand-alone software solution to prove our hypotheses.

Minimum Viable Product

We rapidly develop a high-throughput, fault-tolerant, real-time pared-down solution to satisfy all technical and business metrics.

Scaling and Integration

Deploying to your preferred cloud infrastructure, we coordinate with your DevOps teams on scaling and integration.

ML Ops

By setting up automated data and machine learning pipelines, we iteratively increase your product / service scope, functionality and performance.

Optimisation

We set up advanced metrics to ensure reliability and performance, and A/B testing to continually track and optimise the AI system.

Specialisations

We apply cutting-edge deep learning techniques together with traditional methods to create optimal solutions for our clients.

Deep Learning

AI is the new electricity. Just as 100 years ago electricity transformed industry after industry, AI will now do the same.

- Andrew Ng
Chief Scientist at Baidu

Natural Language Processing

From Naive Bayes to Transformer-XL, we apply both traditional and the latest neural network approaches to solve your text, chat, speech and hybrid tasks.

Computer Vision

Experienced in the latest deep learning methods, architectures and techniques (including GANs and real-time object detection), we are able to solve your 2D/3D image and video tasks.

Data Strategy

Starting from data annotation strategies to building data pipelines, lakes and warehousing; we have the experience your organisation needs.

Optimisation

Achieving suboptimal results? Leverage our years of experience in the art and science of optimisation. And realise the full potential of AI
